entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Decreasing the window size below the amount of data sent can prematurely abort the connection #47452
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template sets policy requiring all request to be authorized. #47448
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template not correctly populating Identity Options. #47447
  • Perf regression: json #47446
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47445
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47444
  • img decoding="async" with blazor #47449
  • Publish an announcement for the event name changes in logging #47436
    8.0-preview4
  • Incorrect results of RangeAttribute #47434
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 should be able to restart executable if startup fails #47432
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #47431
  • IJSObjectReference module import path error #47430
  • dotnet new mvc with -rrc -f net7.0 can't work #47429

Closed

  • IBindFromHttpContext in analyzer message should be IBindableFromHttpContext #47409
    8.0-preview4
  • OutputCacheMiddleware argument null exception if policy sets AllowCacheLookup to false and AllowCacheStorage to true #46671
  • EmptyHttpResult is not straightforward to be used in type checking #45063
    7.0.x
  • RDG doesn't handle `Task.CompletedTask` return #47191
    8.0-preview4
  • Web Socket Always in Closed State #47289
  • HealthCheckPublisherError and HealthCheckPublisherTimeout have the same EventId.Id = 104 #47348
  • Decide if duplicate EventNames in LoggerMessage is appropriate #46072
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4]SmartStore app some javascript function don't work after building and publishing with .net8 SDK #46692
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery doesn't work when name of parameter is the same as a type in the same class #47433
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags correctly #10191
    Backlog
  • Problem with .NET 7 applications on Windows Server 2022 #46867
  • App without a default CORS policy doesn't apply custom CORS policies #47022
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Bump gson to 2.8.9. #47453
    area-signalr
  • Create Linux-Musl Redistributable Artifacts #47451
    area-infrastructure, needs-area-label, .NET 8.0
  • Use Json TypeInfoResolverChain #47450
    needs-area-label
  • Update SDK #47441
    area-infrastructure
  • Clean up unnecessary suppressions #47440
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Support populating cache without serving from it. #47392
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, feature-output-caching, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix misspelled type name in analyzer message #47443
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Added a reminder for the breaking-change process #47412
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 8.0-preview4
  • Refactor HtmlRenderer layering #47404
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Enable custom ICU loading. #47419
    area-blazor, Team:Runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Migrate some tests and fix fallback for empty optional bodies #47377
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Move Returns400IfNoMatchingRouteValueForRequiredParam test case to shared RDG/RDF test infra. #47360
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags provided as a list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix unobserved JSDisconnectedException in NavigationManager #47356
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47400
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3
